## TroveClosureParams type

Parameters of a [closeTrove()](./stablecoin-lib-base.transactableprotocol.closetrove.md) transaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type TroveClosureParams<T> = _CollateralWithdrawal<T> & _NoCollateralDeposit & Partial<_DebtTokenRepayment<T>> & _NoDebtTokenBorrowing;
```

## Remarks

The type parameter `T` specifies the allowed value type(s) of the particular `TroveClosureParams` object's properties.

<table>

<tr> <th> Property </th> <th> Type </th> <th> Description </th> </tr>
